subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the oldest city in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में कौन सी अंतर्गत शहर है।
explanation_en: Jaipur (also known as Pink City) is the oldest city in Rajasthan, established in 1727 by Maharaja Jai Singh II.
explanation_hi: राजस्थान में सरकारीनां प्राप्त थी जीवन का शतीय शहर है तो, यह शहर उपनी की बैंग के महाराष्टम जिले में उत्तर्राष्टम जीवन का शहर है जो बैंग के महाराष्टम जिले में उत्तर्राष्टम जीवन का शहर है।

C_en: Ajmer is the oldest city in Rajasthan, established in the 8th century.
D_en: Jaipur is the heart of Rajasthan, being the capital city.
explanation_en: Ajmer Sharif is one of the oldest cities in Rajasthan and is known for its historical sites such as the Ajmer Darwaza and the Dargah Sharif of Khwaja Sahib.
